title: Issue with chests
body: So I just played a game with {{champion:5}} and got S ranking however no chest, my profile says I have 4 available and I have yet to earn one with him this season, is this happening with other people as well or am I missing something that they did with hextech?

replies.body: I've got your match history pulled up now, and it looks like you haven't had an S on Xin since 2016. The last match played ended with a B, and the one before that you got a C-. Keep in mind you need to score an S- or above in order to get those chests.

https://images.discordapp.net/.eJwFwdENhCAMANBdGICCcBXdhiBBo7aE1vhxud3vva95xmVWs6t2WQG2QwqPzYryyK3axtyumvshtvANWTWX_a6kAj5hihNGXBK6BTE6CH5OHx_ilIJzMfiA8NBJ_JLt1MzvDwkMIt8.bD31nMmQd04zoPp-2yV2UUN5FIk?width=1170&height=659

If you can view picture it shows I've gotten 2 S's on Xin today but have recieved no chest

Ahaaa it looks like our match data is lagging a liiiiittle behind real time at the moment. I do see the S you got in the picture, and when I was triple-checking your account it looks like you've recently been banned from chat. Anytime you receive punishments like this you will lose the ability to gain hextech rewards as well. 

Check up on how those [**hextech crafting restrictions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209939463) work, and as long as you show good reform you'll be able to get those rewards again soon.
